|brand = Industio |model = IDO-SBC2D06-V1B |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = -22W |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = N150 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer, development board |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = 2AFOS-IDO-SOM2D01 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = IDO-SBC2D06-V1B |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = SigmaStar;SSD202; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A7 |cpu1spd = 1.2 GHz <!-- 1.2GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = SPI NAND |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Foresee;FS35ND02G; |flash1size = 256 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = SigmaStar;SSD202;onchip; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = IC+;IP101GR; |lan_ports = 2 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:30:1B |oui = 24:14:07
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2015.01;; |stockos = Linux;4.9.84;buildroot;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, Micro SD Card slot |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = USB Female Micro-B
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Micro SD Card slot, Audio out (3.5mm), MIPI DSI, I2C, SPI, UART, GPIO, RTC w/ battery |addchip = USB to Serial Interface;WCH;CH340E;;1;,,, 2A High Efficiency Synchronous Buck Converter;TI;TLV62569;;1;,,, , 5V 1A USB Power Distribution Switch;Silergy;SY6280AAC;;1; |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = acquired via DHCP |defaultlogin = root |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Tactile <!-- Shenzhen Tactile Intelligent Technology --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 05/31/2021 |estreldate = 04/2021 |estprice = 28 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = 9SIB1A6JEV2593 |asin = B09WDRKQY2 |asin_country = UK |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = <!-- Radio module name, optional link, Leave blank for none --> |rad1modif = USB (module) |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = SigmaStar;SSW101B; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{See also|List of Single-board computers}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[SigmaStar]] SSD202 @1.2GHz :Dual-core ARM (Cortex-A7) *Storage: 256MB SPI NAND Flash, :TF card (max.128GB)/MMC card slot *Memory: 128MB (DDR3) SDRAM (onchip) *USB: 1x USB 2.0 (Host), :1x micro USB 2.0 (OTG) ports *WLAN: [[SigmaStar]] SSW101B :802.11bgn (1T1R) *LAN: 2x Fast Ethernet (RJ45) ports *Power Source: USB Female Micro-B
==Links of Interest== *[http://linux-chenxing.org/infinity2/ido-sbc2d06/ ''IDO-SBC2D06'' on '''linux-chenxing''' Wiki] *[https://linuxgizmos.com/dual-lan-router-board-starts-at-26/ ''Dual-LAN router board starts'' on '''LinuxGizmos'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2021/04/19/dual-ethernet-sigmastar-ssd201-ssd202-sbc-supports-4-inch-or-7-inch-displays/ ''Dual Ethernet SigmaStar SSD201/SSD202 SBC'' on '''CNX|Software''']
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:Industio IDO-SBC2D06-V1B-22W Top.jpeg|Board Top File:Industio IDO-SBC2D06-V1B-22W Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
